game.name: Chessmate
game.genres: 캐주얼, 스포츠, 전략, 교육, 소프트웨어 교육
game.shortDescription: This program is not just a game, but a chess learning software. The software includes basic analysis functions, classic chess games, opening, middle, and endgame books, as well as the ability to synchronize one's own game data from online platforms and generate incorrect questions for learning.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This program is not just a game, but a chess learning software. The software includes basic analysis functions, classic chess games, opening, middle, and endgame books, as well as the ability to synchronize one's own game data from online platforms and generate incorrect questions for learning.
